mapper.update: UPDATE users SET points = points + #{delta} WHERE id=#{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO points_transactions(user_id, change_amount, balance_after, type, remark, related_id) VALUES(#{userId}, #{change}, #{balanceAfter}, #{type}, #{remark}, #{relatedId})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM points_transactions WHERE user_id=#{userId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users WHERE points > 0
SELECT COALESCE(SUM(change_amount), 0) FROM points_transactions WHERE DATE(created_at) = CURDATE()
SELECT COALESCE(SUM(change_amount), 0) FROM points_transactions WHERE created_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)

SELECT pt.id, u.username, pt.change_amount as points, pt.remark, pt.created_at as createdAt FROM points_transactions pt LEFT JOIN users u ON pt.related_id = u.id WHERE pt.user_id = #{userId} AND pt.type IN ('INVITE_REWARD', 'INVITER_REWARD') ORDER BY pt.created_at DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{size}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM points_transactions WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND type IN ('INVITE_REWARD', 'INVITER_REWARD')
